trans-unit.source: Create two 1/1 white Human creature tokens.\nFateful hour — If you have 5 or less life, create five of those tokens instead.

trans-unit.source: Enchant player\nAt the beginning of enchanted player's upkeep, CARDNAME deals damage to that player equal to the number of Curses attached to them.
